#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;


int length(string a,string b)
{
   int n=a.size();
   int m=b.size();
   int i,j,arr[n+1][m+1];
   for(i=0;i<=m;i++) arr[0][i]=0;
   for(j=0;j<=n;j++) arr[j][0]=0;
   for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   {
       for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
       {
           if(a[i-1]==b[j-1])
           {
               arr[i][j]=arr[i-1][j-1]+1;
           }
           else
           {
               arr[i][j]=max(arr[i-1][j],arr[i][j-1]);
           }
       }
   }
   return arr[n][m];
}

int main()
{

    /*clock_t tm=clock();

    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);*/


    int t,l;
    cin>>t;
    for(l=1;l<=t;l++)
    {
         int n,m,cnt;
         cin>>n>>m;
         string a,b;
         cin>>a>>b;
         cnt=max(n,m);
         cnt+=min(n,m)-length(a,b);
         cout<<"Case "<<l<<": "<<cnt<<endl;
    }

    /*cout<<"Execution time: "<<((float)tm/CLOCKS_PER_SEC)<<endl;*/
    return 0;
}
